availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Robinson (Stanford, Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Stanford, Lincoln County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Robinson. Farmer in Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned thirteen enslaved persons in Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Stanford, Lincoln County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2, p. 238A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 2.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 10.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln County, p. 339A.
